channel.title: What is a safe Website to buy RSGP?
channel.description: I am looking you buy RSGP, I see my friends do it but I can never get ahold of them before they can tell me site. If you guys bought Gp and it worked what Website?

item.title: What is a safe Website to buy RSGP?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:43, topic:392838”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=490008.msg3616224#msg3616224 date=1306985504]

[quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=490008.msg3615983#msg3615983 date=1306971606]

Just bought 800m From a Trusted Gold Seller for 600 Bucks. So I’m shining!
[/quote]That’s stupid. You could probably get that from Corporal Beast within 3 days.

I dont have stats.

I can afford 600 Dollars, I have a good job so I do not need to worry about cash.
[/quote]Not to mention that is NOTHING compared to what people spend on other games, WoW for example.

yeah i have a friend who spent like ~8500 on WoW last month

inb4 old topic comes up.
I’d rather have a car.[/quote]
Same, you guys can have your 1b in RuneScape, Ill keep my apartment and car.

item.title: What is a safe Website to buy RSGP?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Gold4rs = Rip off.
Not to mention the fact that they call your phone, for the “phone call confirmation” (Selling numbers for $)
And they dont understand a word your saying because they cant even speakie english.
So, that being said,
I recommend you going to rscoders, or some other underground rs forum and trying your luck there.
People sell RSGP there for .60/m
Goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: What is a safe Website to buy RSGP?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:24, topic:392838”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=490008.msg3595949#msg3595949 date=1305074100]

Do not buy or sell to gold4rs.com if you buy amounts that are high enough for them to make some decent money with scamming, they do.

No… Thats against the law? I think they’d get shut down.

RWT is against the law anyways, i think.

Gold4rs, all legit

I don’t think RWT is illegal. Just against RuneScapes rules.

Buying - against rules
Selling - illegal

Kinda like Cocaine.

I dont think its illegal or its just not enforced
[/quote]

No, it’s just that those who get all of that money on their account to trade it to the buyer probably take a lot of precautions, like proxies. Just in the event of being cause. Illegal drugs circulate all around. And when one of the dealers is cause, it’s rather hard to trace the source if they’re a legit operation.[/quote]

Having a buisness like Gold4rs is only legal in China and this isn’t meant to be a joke. Some people in china actually go to work in a building for this site.

Read full topic
